code: import*as types from'../actions/actionTypes';import initialState from'./initialState';var loanHistoryReducer=function loanHistoryReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState.loanHistory;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case types.LOAD_REPAYMENT_HISTORY:return action.loanHistory;default:return state;}};export default loanHistoryReducer;
